title.zh: 武汉：第十四届中国罕见病高峰论坛

description.zh: 2025第十四届中国罕见病高峰论坛由蔻德罕见病中心与华中科技大学同济医学院附属同济医院联合主办，来自南昌市血之友公益协会的左国良和左钰洁得以参加。在第五届金蜗牛奖颁奖典礼，血友姐妹会负责人左钰洁作为颁奖嘉宾颁发「罕见病医学贡献奖」；在血友病国际专场圆桌讨论环节，左钰洁与国内外专家共同探讨全球血友病未满足需求和挑战。血友姐妹会多位成员积极担任志愿者。
description.en: The 2025 14th China Rare Disease Summit was jointly hosted by CORD Rare Disease Center and Tongji Hospital affiliated with Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology. Zuo Guoliang and Yujie (Ruby) Zuo from Nanchang Hemophilia Association participated. At the 5th Golden Snail Award ceremony, Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, leader of the Hemophilia Sisters team, served as an award presenter for the 'Rare Disease Medical Contribution Award'. In the hemophilia international session roundtable discussion, Yujie (Ruby) Zuo joined domestic and international experts to discuss global unmet needs and challenges in hemophilia. Multiple members of the Hemophilia Sisters team actively served as volunteers.

description.zh: 血友姐妹会成员在第十四届中国罕见病高峰论坛担任志愿者获得的证书
description.en: Certificate received by Hemophilia Sisters members for volunteering at the 14th China Rare Disease Summit
